name: Outlaw Tribe Nemesis Expansion
detailed_description:
The Outlaw Tribe Nemesis Expansion includes:

• Thousands of NEW Nemesis System enemies, followers & stories
• NEW Orc Weapons, fatalities and brutalities
• NEW Fortress, Outpost and Wilderness gameplay
• NEW Legendary Gear Set for the Bright Lord

The Outlaw Tribe are Mordor's ultimate rebels, defying the domination of the Dark Lord and the Bright Lord alike and fighting for the Age of the Orc. However, when they can be controlled they make fearsome followers and mighty warriors. They wield unique chains to capture their enemies and salvage weapons and armor.

Outlaw Fortresses are filled with warriors who train relentlessly and are among the toughest defenders in Mordor.

short_description: The Outlaw Tribe Nemesis Expansion includes: • Thousands of NEW Nemesis System enemies, followers & stories • NEW Orc Weapons, fatalities and brutalities • NEW Fortress, Outpost and Wilderness gameplay • NEW Legendary Gear Set for the Bright Lord
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian, Arabic, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7 SP1 with Platform Update
  • Процессор: AMD FX-4350, 4.2 GHz / Intel Core i5-2300, 2.80 GHz
  • Оперативная память: 6 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: AMD HD 7870, 2 GB / NVIDIA GTX 660, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 70 GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 10 Creators Update
  • Процессор: AMD FX-8350, 4.0 GHz/ Intel Core i7-3770, 3.4 GHz
  • Оперативная память: 12 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: AMD RX 480, 4 GB or RX580, 4 GB / NVIDIA GTX 970, 4 GB or GTX1060, 6 GB
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 70 GB
